**1. Why sanctions are used – the intended logic**

| Step | What policymakers hope will happen | Typical assumption behind the step |

| **A. Economic pressure** | Cut off or make costly the target’s access to finance, trade, technology, or investment. | The target’s economy will feel enough pain that the cost of continuing the “undesired” behaviour outweighs the benefits. |
